attributes.review:
Shawty's like a melody in my head
That I can't keep out, got me singin' like
Na-na-na-na, everyday
It's like my iPod stuck on replay, replay-ay-ay-ay
Shawty's like a melody in my head
That I can't keep out, got me singin' like (ayy!)
Na-na-na-na, everyday
It's like my iPod stuck on replay (J-J-J-JR), replay

[Verse 1]
Remember the first time we met?
You was at the mall wit' yo' friend
I was scared to approach ya, but then you came closer
Hopin' you would give me a chance
Who would have ever knew
That we would ever be more than friends?
We're real worldwide, breaking all the rules
She like a song played again and again

[Pre-Chorus]
That girl, like somethin' off a poster
That girl, is a dime they say
That girl, is a gun to my holster
And she's running through my mind all day, ayy

Na-na-na-na, everyday
It's like my iPod stuck on replay, replay-ay-ay-ay

See you been all around the globe
Not once did you leave my mind

Girl, you really changed my life
Doin' things I never do
I'm in the kitchen cookin' things she likes
We're real worldwide, breaking all the rules
Someday I wanna make you my wife

[Pre-Chorus]

That girl, is a dime they say (Hey)
That girl, is a gun to my holster
And she's running through my mind all day, ayy

Shawty's like a melody in my head
That I can't keep out, got me singin' like (Ayy)
Na-na-na-na, everyday
It's like my iPod stuck on replay, replay-ay-ay-ay

[Bridge]
I can be your melody
Oh, girl, I could write you a symphony
The one that could fill your fantasies
So come baby girl, let's sing with me, ayy
I can be your melody
Oh, girl, I could write you a symphony
The one that could fill your fantasies
So come baby girl let's sing with me, ayy
Na, na-na, na-na, na-na

right when i opened the app i was harassed by an army of odd cheeto oompa loompas 😿🍆 they all chanted “spanky butt” over and over again 😨😪 im convinced it was a cult 😡😡 they tried to eat our furniture, and i watched as one shoved a full oven down its throat 🤥💥 i no longer trust orange spectator god 🍊🙅‍♀️ he should be put out of his misery 🙀👻👿🤪🍊🤫✨
attributes.title: spanky butt🤬💔🍊

attributes.review: a HORRIFIC app. I downloaded it the other day and left it there, planning to venture into the app when the time comes. But on that night when I got it, I went to bed like a normal human being and slept. What I didn’t know was that the app will haunt my nightmares.Trump was suddenly in my dream, orange and boiled as ever, and he was wearing simply a diaper and looked like a giant baby. He then began started to stomp and puke all over me till I vowed to say, “I love trump!” and right after that, his corn hair began to fall all over me. Once I woke up, I realized the app was behind this traumatic experience as my friends revealed they had similar nightmares of orange giant baby trump tormenting them. Don’t buy this app if you don’t want trauma!
attributes.title: Trump manifested me

attributes.review: Idk what app this is but it’s not good !!!! Rate 0000/10!!!! Do not get it
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I hate this app and will never ever ever in my life time would recommend this to any of my friends family or the public.this app is not only awful but just completely irrelevant to anything and everything going on in the world right now I would give it zero stars if I could 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊
attributes.title: Horrible app 🤢🤢🤢awful content 🤮

attributes.review: I came here to download this app to show my support to 🍊. I waited a weeks for this to download, and once it finally did download I open the app and my phone glitched so bad I had to get it fixed by a technician! It cost me 1,000 dollars! I know what you’re wondering why didn’t I just get a new phone? This phone has so many important memories of my dead rat. My rat really reminds me of 🍊 so I couldn’t bear losing those pictures! I tried opening the app again because I was still determined to show my support no matter what! But once again my phone glitched and started playing a song that goes, “I like big butts and I cannot lie!” I was petrified! What’s worse was that the song was sung by 🍊. In the background I heard a child screaming, “Help! I’m being held captive by this pedo!” But since I’m a stupid 🍊 supporter I didn’t care and continued to think he was a good president! I closed the app and tried to open it once more, this time is what probably developed my PTSD. It was a picture of 🍊 nudes! My only comment is, “Small”. A few days later a get a text from 🍊 himself saying, “Give my app 5 stars or else I will poop all over your house and I will hack into your pictures and delete every photo and fill your camera roll with my poop and vomit!” I was so scared! After deleting the app the fbi broke into my house and pointed guns at me while chanting, “ 5 STAR REVIEW, 5 STAR REVIEW” and then left. I had to buy new windows and and a new door which cost me another fortune. After leaving this review I think they may come back to shoot me down so if I die I just wanna tell my family I love them. I just wanna say if 🍊 is reading this then I just wanna say before you send your FBI agents to come get me that I have already gone to visit your family and I have told them of all the horrible things you have done and they said that they have officially disowned you! If anyone else has complaints to tell his family go to the nearest orange tree farm and speak to them there. Overall I just wanna say don’t ever get this app! It was a huge mistake! It may even cost your life downloading the app!
attributes.title: Near Neath Experience

attributes.review:

attributes.title: Very bad🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: i downloaded & automatically felt like i was being summoned. my fishes started drowning & my snail started walking. after this happened for ab 5 mins, an earthquake occurred 😱. it was scary. if i had the option to give this app -0287438/5 stars, i would. so disappointed 😡🥵🤬🤯🤔.
attributes.title: the worst app ever ❤️
